question.xref: DES s12, HC r114, HC r226
question.text: Front fog lights should be used

explanation.text: When visibility is seriously reduced, switch on your fog lights if you have them fitted. It is essential not only that you can see ahead, but also that other road users are able to see you.

answer.text: when visibility is reduced to 100 metres (328 feet)
as a warning to oncoming traffic
when driving during the hours of darkness
in any conditions and at any time
